Texts.Chs: 这可能是你一段时间以来读过的最令人不安的书。它详细说明了如何最好地照顾和饲料绦虫，以便其最大限度地增长，用于病毒和细菌研究。它为利用这些可怕的寄生虫达到良性... 和非良性... 的目的提供了理由。
Texts.Eng: This is potentially the most disturbing book you've read in some time. It details how best to care and feed a tapeworm you are afflicted by in order to maximize its growth for use in viral and bacteriological studies. It makes a case for utilizing these horrifying parasites for benign...and non-benign...purposes.
